movies.title: Astonishing
movies.plot: Mandy receives a DVD on which a mysterious man tells her she's going to lose her husband, her current lifestyle, and her identity. Mandy goes see a shrink, but nothing comes of it. Then one evening she and her husnand Kenny get into an auto accident. Three weeks later Mandy wakes up, and the world has gone topsy-turvy. Kenny's assistant Fiona has usurped her identity as Mandy, and everyone else is recognizing Mandy as Fiona.
movies.simplePlot: Mandy receives a DVD on which a mysterious man tells her she's going to lose her husband, her current lifestyle, and her identity. Mandy goes see a shrink, but nothing comes of it. Then one...

biography.bio: Man Sze Au is an actress, known for Chut doi seung giu (2008), Spacked Out (2000) and Luk lau hau joh (2003).
biography.name: Man Sze Au

biography.bio: Nelson Cheung is an actor and art director, known for Wan 9 zhao 5 (1994), 9413 (1998) and Shou xing xin ren lei (2000).
biography.name: Nelson Cheung

biography.bio: Jason Chu is an actor, known for Young and Dangerous 3 (1996), Young and Dangerous (1996) and Young and Dangerous 2 (1996).
biography.name: Jason Chu

biography.bio: Christy Chung was born on September 19, 1970 in Montréal, Québec, Canada. She is an actress, known for Samsara (2001), Le médaillon (2003) and The Defender (1994). She was previously married to Jon Yen and Glen Ross.
biography.name: Christy Chung

biography.bio: Alex Fong was born on March 17, 1963 in Portuguese Macau as Lik Fu. He is known for his work on One Nite in Mongkok (2004), Kung Fu Killer (2014) and Double Tap (2000). He has been married to Ho-Yan Mok since June 7, 2008. They have one child.
biography.name: Alex Fong

biography.bio: Lik-Sun Fong was born on February 26, 1980 in Hong Kong as Alex Fong Lik Sun. He is an actor, known for Love Is Not All Around (2007), Ngor dik zeoi oi (2008) and Marriage with a Fool (2006).
biography.name: Lik-Sun Fong

biography.bio: Sasha Hou is an actress, known for Hui lu (2007), Seoul Raiders (2005) and Love @ First Note (2006).
biography.name: Sasha Hou

biography.bio: Born in Hong Kong, Sammo Hung's acting career began while he was training in acrobatics, martial arts and dance as a child at the China Drama Academy, and he received acclaim for his performance with a troupe called "The Seven Little Fortunes." He made his feature film debut as an actor at the age of 12, and has worked in numerous martial arts films as an actor, director, producer and/or choreographer, collaborating with Bruce Lee and Jackie Chan, two superstars of the genre. He is now internationally renowned as a pioneer and trend-setter in Hong Kong action films. Hung's big break as a film actor came with a role as a sparring partner in the Bruce Lee film Opération dragon (1973). He established his reputation as a skilled physical comedian in several kung-fu comedies, beginning with "Enter the Fat Dragon" (Enter the Fat Dragon (1978)). He also produced and starred in numerous successful films throughout the 1970s and 1980s for Hong Kong's leading film studio, Golden Harvest. Hung collaborated in the 1980s with long-time friend Jackie Chan in a highly successful series of action comedies that cemented Hung's reputation as a consummate actor/director and launched Chan's career as an international star. For a while, Hung also starred in an American TV series, Martial Law (1998). He directed Once Upon a Time in China and America (1997), his first film shot in the US. He and his wife, Mina, now divide their time between homes in Hong Kong and Los Angeles.
biography.name: Sammo Kam-Bo Hung

biography.bio: Timmy Hung was born on August 5, 1975 in Hong Kong as Tin-Ming Hung. He is known for his work on New Police Story (2004), Ip Man: Le combat final (2013) and S.P.L. (2005).
biography.name: Timmy Hung

biography.bio: Yiu-Cheung Lai was born on May 4, 1964 in Hong Kong, British Crown Colony. He is an actor, known for Filatures (2007), Dog Bite Dog (2006) and The Detective (2007). He has been married to Julia Leung since 1997. They have one child.
biography.name: Yiu-Cheung Lai

biography.bio: Choi Wah 'Rain' Lee is an actress, known for On the Edge (2006), Dan sun bo lok (2007) and 2002 (2001).
biography.name: Choi Wah 'Rain' Lee

biography.bio: Lam-Yan Lee is an actor, known for Hung wun chiu yun (2003), Explosive City (2004) and Astonishing (2004).
biography.name: Lam-Yan Lee

biography.bio: Carlo Ng is an actor, known for Shao nian 15/16 shi (1996), Astonishing (2004) and Osaka Wrestling Restaurant (2004).
biography.name: Carlo Ng

biography.bio: Wai-Hong Or is an actor and art director, known for The Cheaters (2001), Hidden Track (2003) and Escape from Hong Kong Island (2004).
biography.name: Wai-Hong Or

biography.bio: William Wing Hong So was born on September 24, 1967 in Hong Kong. He is an actor, known for Fly Me to Polaris (1999), Luk lau hau joh (2003) and Diva (2012).
biography.name: William Wing Hong So
